QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, odf_ui_list_cols.id odf_pk, odf_ui_list_cols.PINNED pinned, odf_ui_list_cols.CODE code, odf_ui_list_cols.METADATA_URL metadata_url, odf_ui_list_cols.IS_SELECTED is_selected, odf_ui_list_cols.VIEW_ID view_id, CREATED.FULL_NAME created_by, odf_ui_list_cols.SORT_POSITION sort_position, odf_ui_list_cols.NAME name, UPDATED.FULL_NAME updated_by, odf_ui_list_cols.POSITION position, ODF_UI_LIST_COLS.CREATED_DATE created_date, odf_ca_odf_ui_listcolumn.partition_code partition_code, ODF_UI_LIST_COLS.LAST_UPDATED_DATE last_updated_date, odf_ui_list_cols.SORT_ORDER sort_order from odf_ui_list_cols odf_ui_list_cols, odf_ui_views odf_ui_views, srm_resources CREATED, srm_resources UPDATED, odf_ca_odf_ui_listcolumn odf_ca_odf_ui_listcolumn where 1 = 1 and odf_ui_list_cols.view_id = odf_ui_views.id and odf_ui_list_cols.created_by = CREATED.user_id and odf_ui_list_cols.last_updated_by = UPDATED.user_id and odf_ui_list_cols.id = odf_ca_odf_ui_listcolumn.id
